item.title: Habibur eyes fastest BPL century
item.description:
Habibur Rahman Sohan often made the headlines for his explosive knocks. The power-hitter had a stellar campaign in the recent Asia Cup Rising Stars, including the fastest T20 century for Bangladesh. The right-handed batter reached the three figure mark off just 35 balls against Hong Kong and finished the tournament as the third-highest run-scorer. He also played a key role in Bangladesh’s runners-up finish. Habibur also holds the record of the fastest List-A hundred, which came from 49 balls and now aims to hit another big one in the forthcoming Bangladesh Premier League for his franchise, Noakhali Express. In an interview with New Age’s Tarif Akhlaq, the power-hitter reflects on his journey, ambition and future. Here are the excerpts:
